entities.name: ginny
entities.description: Ginny is mentioned as the one who expressed surprise at Ludo's behavior.

entities.name: ludo
entities.description: Ludo is described as the head of the sports department and a former Quidditch player for England.

entities.name: muggles
entities.description: Muggles are mentioned as people who do not know about magic.

entities.name: mr. weasley
entities.description: Mr. Weasley is quoted as agreeing with Ginny's opinion on Ludo's behavior.

entities.name: wimbourne wasps
entities.description: Wimbourne Wasps are mentioned as a Quidditch team that Ludo played for.

relationships.description: Ludo talks about Bludgers near Muggles, which is considered inappropriate.
